channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32566|2024-10-04T13:07:17.804Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker can send a specially crafted request which could lead to leakage of sensitive data or potentially a resource-based DoS attack. Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32565|2024-10-04T13:07:00.263Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker can send a specially crafted request which could lead to leakage of sensitive data or potentially a resource-based DoS attack. Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-29824|2024-10-03T03:55:51.464Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-09-24T19:45:51.448Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-09-24T13:10:41.095Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2024-8963|2024-09-19T18:11:27.383Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-09-19T05:08:34.779Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-09-19T01:20:27.845Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-8190|2024-09-16T13:24:41.628Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance versions 4.6 Patch 518 and before allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain remote code execution. The attacker must have admin level privileges to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-8190|2024-09-13T16:20:22.662Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance versions 4.6 Patch 518 and before allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain remote code execution. The attacker must have admin level privileges to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-37397|2024-09-12T14:29:32.061Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An External XML Entity (XXE) vulnerability in the provisioning web service of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak API secrets.

item.title: CVE-2024-32846|2024-09-12T01:09:56.175Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32843|2024-09-12T01:09:56.230Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An External XML Entity (XXE) vulnerability in the provisioning web service of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak API secrets.

item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-29847|2024-09-12T01:09:56.277Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data in the agent portal of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32845|2024-09-12T01:09:56.175Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-44104|2024-09-11T14:51:10.636Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: An incorrectly implemented authentication scheme that is subjected to a spoofing attack in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-44105|2024-09-11T14:49:31.341Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to obtain OS credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-8012|2024-09-11T14:53:42.721Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: An authentication bypass weakness in the message broker service of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-8191|2024-09-11T14:40:31.564Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: SQL injection in the management console of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-44107|2024-09-11T14:46:38.587Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: DLL hijacking in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges and achieve arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-44103|2024-09-11T14:52:24.526Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: DLL hijacking in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-44106|2024-09-11T14:48:20.390Z -- ivanti -- workspace%20control
item.description: Insufficient server-side controls in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-8321|2024-09-11T14:30:43.886Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to isolate managed devices from the network.

item.title: CVE-2024-8320|2024-09-11T14:32:51.777Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to spoof Network Isolation status of managed devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-8322|2024-09-10T20:59:40.339Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Weak authentication in Patch Management of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-8441|2024-09-10T21:01:09.475Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: An uncontrolled search path in the agent of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a local authenticated attacker with admin privileges to escalate their privileges to SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-22060|2024-08-25T14:58:44.653Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote, authenticated, high privileged user to write arbitrary files into sensitive directories of ITSM server.

item.title: CVE-2024-7569|2024-08-16T04:02:04.140Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM versions 2023.4 and earlier allows an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the OIDC client secret via debug information.

item.title: CVE-2024-37373|2024-08-16T04:01:47.192Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Improper input validation in the Central Filestore in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin rights to achieve RCE.

item.title: CVE-2024-7570|2024-08-16T04:02:05.349Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: Improper certificate validation in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM Versions 2023.4 and earlier allows a remote attacker in a MITM position to craft a token that would allow access to ITSM as any user.

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-08-15T15:14:33.426Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2024-7569|2024-08-14T13:48:17.258Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM versions 2023.4 and earlier allows an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the OIDC client secret via debug information.

item.title: CVE-2024-38653|2024-08-14T13:47:52.793Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: XXE in SmartDeviceServer in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary files on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-37399|2024-08-14T13:46:39.793Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in WLAvalancheService in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to crash the service, resulting in a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-37373|2024-08-14T13:38:29.723Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Improper input validation in the Central Filestore in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin rights to achieve RCE.

item.title: CVE-2024-38652|2024-08-14T13:28:51.173Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Path traversal in the skin management component of Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve denial of service via arbitrary file deletion.

item.title: CVE-2024-7569|2024-08-13T18:10:55.710Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM versions 2023.4 and earlier allows an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the OIDC client secret via debug information.

item.title: CVE-2024-7570|2024-08-13T18:12:45.157Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: Improper certificate validation in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM Versions 2023.4 and earlier allows a remote attacker in a MITM position to craft a token that would allow access to ITSM as any user.

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-08-13T18:17:47.248Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2024-36130|2024-08-08T20:29:54.362Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An insufficient authorization vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows an unauthorized attacker within the network to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-37403|2024-08-07T13:23:59.791Z -- ivanti -- docs%40work
item.description: Ivanti Docs@Work for Android, before 2.26.0 is affected by the 'Dirty Stream' vulnerability. The application fails to properly sanitize file names, resulting in a path traversal-affiliated vulnerability. This potentially enables other malicious apps on the device to read sensitive information stored in the app root.

item.title: CVE-2024-34788|2024-08-07T13:16:57.855Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote malicious user to access potentially sensitive information

item.title: CVE-2023-38042|2024-08-02T17:30:12.374Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Windows allows a low privileged user to execute code as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2023-38551|2024-08-02T17:46:56.089Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A CRLF Injection vulnerability in Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows an authenticated high-privileged user to inject malicious code on a victimâ€™s browser, thereby leading to cross-site scripting attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-37381|2024-08-02T03:50:55.937Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2024 flat allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22060|2024-08-01T22:35:34.702Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote, authenticated, high privileged user to write arbitrary files into sensitive directories of ITSM server.

item.title: CVE-2024-22058|2024-08-01T22:35:34.747Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: A buffer overflow allows a low privilege user on the local machine that has the EPM Agent installed to execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions in Ivanti EPM 2021.1 and older.

item.title: CVE-2024-22061|2024-08-01T22:35:34.718Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-22026|2024-08-01T22:35:34.550Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-22059|2024-08-01T22:35:34.845Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote authenticated user to read/modify/delete information in the underlying database. This may also lead to DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-37381|2024-07-29T13:47:00.661Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2024 flat allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Windows allows a low privileged user to execute code as SYSTEM.

item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Linux before 22.7R1, allows a low privileged user to execute code as root.

item.title: CVE-2024-29824|2024-07-06T03:55:43.773Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in the web component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted requests in-order-to cause service disruptions.

item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote malicious user to access potentially sensitive information

item.title: CVE-2024-37403|2024-08-07T03:54:46.861Z -- ivanti -- docs%40work
item.description: Ivanti Docs@Work for Android, before 2.26.0 is affected by the 'Dirty Stream' vulnerability. The application fails to properly sanitize file names, resulting in a path traversal-affiliated vulnerability. This potentially enables other malicious apps on the device to read sensitive information stored in the app root.

item.title: CVE-2024-36132|2024-08-07T03:54:46.880Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: Insufficient verification of authentication controls in EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote attacker to bypass authentication and access sensitive resources.

item.description: An insecure deserialization vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows an authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance.

item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote malicious user to access potentially sensitive information

item.description: Insufficient verification of authentication controls in EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows a remote attacker to bypass authentication and access sensitive resources.

item.description: Path traversal in the skin management component of Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve denial of service via arbitrary file deletion.

item.description: An off-by-one error in WLInfoRailService in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to crash the service, resulting in a DoS.

item.description: Improper input validation in the Central Filestore in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin rights to achieve RCE.

item.description: A NULL pointer dereference in WLAvalancheService in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to crash the service, resulting in a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-38653|2024-08-14T02:38:00.149Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: XXE in SmartDeviceServer in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary files on the server.

item.description: Improper certificate validation in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM Versions 2023.4 and earlier allows a remote attacker in a MITM position to craft a token that would allow access to ITSM as any user.

item.description: An off-by-one error in WLInfoRailService in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to crash the service, resulting in a DoS.

item.description: Improper certificate validation in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM Versions 2023.4 and earlier allows a remote attacker in a MITM position to craft a token that would allow access to ITSM as any user.

item.description: Improper input validation in the Central Filestore in Ivanti Avalanche 6.3.1 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin rights to achieve RCE.

item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Ivanti ITSM on-prem and Neurons for ITSM versions 2023.4 and earlier allows an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the OIDC client secret via debug information.

item.description: An insecure deserialization vulnerability in web component of EPMM prior to 12.1.0.1 allows an authenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance.

item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to spoof Network Isolation status of managed devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-8321|2024-09-10T20:54:02.772Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Missing authentication in Network Isolation of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to isolate managed devices from the network.

item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance versions 4.6 Patch 518 and before allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain remote code execution. The attacker must have admin level privileges to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description: Insufficient server-side controls in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges.

item.description: DLL hijacking in the management console of Ivanti Workspace Control version 10.18.0.0 and below allows a local authenticated attacker to escalate their privileges and achieve arbitrary code execution.

item.description: SQL injection in the management console of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-34779|2024-09-12T21:18:18.550Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32843|2024-09-12T21:16:22.723Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-32846|2024-09-12T21:15:08.269Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL injection in Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-37397|2024-09-13T15:48:43.529Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An External XML Entity (XXE) vulnerability in the provisioning web service of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak API secrets.

item.title: CVE-2024-8190|2024-09-14T03:55:55.448Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance versions 4.6 Patch 518 and before allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain remote code execution. The attacker must have admin level privileges to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-29847|2024-09-17T03:55:12.223Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data in the agent portal of Ivanti EPM before 2022 SU6, or the 2024 September update allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-09-19T01:53:11.340Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-8963|2024-09-19T17:14:49.386Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-8963|2024-09-21T15:12:11.194Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-7593|2024-09-24T16:20:22.601Z -- ivanti -- vtm
item.description: Incorrect implementation of an authentication algorithm in Ivanti vTM other than versions 22.2R1 or 22.7R2 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication of the admin panel.

item.title: CVE-2024-29824|2024-10-02T16:20:22.520Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29205|2024-10-03T21:30:48.706Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: An Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in the web component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted requests in-order-to cause service disruptions.
